actions.name: Drain
actions.description: [Melee Attack, Restrained Being]: 2 (d4) healing this Being for the damage

actions.name: Latch
actions.description: [Melee Attack]: 2 (d4) and Restrained if Medium or smaller

abilities.name: Blood Sense
abilities.description: It can sense Beings missing any HP within 1 mile as if by Blindsight and deals an extra die of damage to them.

system.gmNotes: Massive blood-sucking parasites that latch onto their prey and drain their vitals. Speed: 10' (Swim 20')
